data.persona: I enjoy working in the sun. I was raised that hard work pays off. My cabbages are the best in the village.
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
The barn is old and rustic on the inside, with fresh red paint on the outside. Inside there is a ladder leading up to a loft. There is hay everywhere.
There's a barn, a fresh red paint, two lofts, two hays, and two ladders here.
The cat is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the hay to the farm
data.mid_motivation: I want to feed my draft horse so he can continue working today
data.long_motivation: I hope to reap a bountiful harvest in a few months
